Package ui.game

Class Game.ExitToMenuButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.drawing.DrawableSection
      • ui.input.selection.DrawableSelectableSection
        • ui.menu.button.Button
          • ui.menu.button.ChangeViewButton<MinimumSize<SelectableCentredSection<GameMenu>>,​MinimumSize<SelectableCentredSection<GameMenu>>>
            • ui.game.Game.ExitToMenuButton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PrintHandler, Section, SelectableSection, SelectionHandler
    Enclosing class:
    Game
    private class Game.ExitToMenuButton
extends ChangeViewButton<MinimumSize<SelectableCentredSection<GameMenu>>,​MinimumSize<SelectableCentredSection<GameMenu>>>
    A button to exit to the main game menu from the pause menu or from the game finished dialog.
    A button that changes to a different window. This is done by changing the TerminalHandler's print, resize, and key handlers to the new window.
    Represents a selectable button.
    Represents a selectable section that can be drawn to the terminal window.
    Represents a section that can be drawn to the terminal window.

    • Method Detail

      • select

        public KeyHandler select​(KeyHandler current)
        Called when the user selects this element. In this case, change to the new view. In this case exit the game.
        Specified by:
        select in interface SelectionHandler
        Overrides:
        select in class ChangeViewButton<MinimumSize<SelectableCentredSection<GameMenu>>,​MinimumSize<SelectableCentredSection<GameMenu>>>
        Parameters:
        current - The current KeyHandler.
        Returns:
        The KeyHandler to return (could be a different key handler for e.g. entering text).
